RoomTemplate.Title: Approaching the &+rMinotaur&n Stronghold
RoomTemplate.Description: A fortress is visible off in the distance to the North. The footprints of many humanoids are visible on the path and the sound of battle can be heard faintly further down the path.

RoomTemplate.Title: Approaching a Battlefield Before the Stronghold
RoomTemplate.Description: A well-worn path curves here due to the hilly terrain. Not far to the north and west you can hear the sounds of battle and some faint shouting. The smell of death is in the air.

RoomTemplate.Title: Before a Battlefield
RoomTemplate.Description: A battlefield opens up to the leaft as the path widens. Scattered pieces of broken armor and weaponry litter the field. The sounds of combat echo through the hills to the north.

RoomTemplate.Title: On a Battlefield
RoomTemplate.Description: This is obviously a battlefield. The ground is trampled by the prints of many boots and hooves. Broken weaponry, shattered armor, and fresh bodies litter the ground.

RoomTemplate.Title: Southeast Corner of the &+LOrcish&n Encampment
RoomTemplate.Description: This corner of the Orcish encampment is little more than a few scattered tents at the edge of the battlefield. Less sheltered than the rest of the camp, this area would be one of the first to be destroyed if enemy were to sally forth from the stronghold.

RoomTemplate.Title: On a Battlefield
RoomTemplate.Description: This is obviously a battlefield. The ground is trampled by the prints of many boots and hooves. Broken weaponry, shattered armor, and fresh bodies litter the ground.

RoomTemplate.Title: East of a Breach in the Wall
RoomTemplate.Description: You stand before the sheer wall of the minotaur stronghold. It would be very easy for a defender to drop something heavy and painful from this distance. Off to the west you see a breach in the wall where the Orcish siege engines have pierced the stronghold's defenses. The battlefield stretches off to the south.

RoomTemplate.Title: Before a Breach in the Wall
RoomTemplate.Description: You stand before a breach in the wall of the stronghold. The hole is narrow, but is still more than adequate to let attackers gain entry. The battlefield stretches off to the south.

RoomTemplate.Title: On a Battlefield
RoomTemplate.Description: This is obviously a battlefield. The ground is trampled by the prints of many boots and hooves. Broken weaponry, shattered armor, and fresh bodies litter the ground.

RoomTemplate.Title: Edge of a Battlefield
RoomTemplate.Description: This is obviously a battlefield. The ground is trampled by the prints of many boots and hooves. Broken weaponry, shattered armor, and fresh bodies litter the ground. The Orcs have set up their siege engines here and are pounding the walls with as much force as they can muster.

RoomTemplate.Title: North of the Captain's Tent
RoomTemplate.Description: This heavily-travelled path sits just outside the captain's tent. Soldiers travel in all directions, heading off to battle or returning from it.

RoomTemplate.Title: The &+LOrcish&n Captain's Tent
RoomTemplate.Description: This is both the temporary home of the captain of the Orcish forces and the strategic command point for the assaulting troops. Maps and plans are spread out on a large table and the interior is lit by two burning braziers. It is surprisingly hot in this area.

RoomTemplate.Title: West of the Captain's Tent
RoomTemplate.Description: This area is littered with various tents and campsites. The more important members of the assaulting force are quartered here, mainly sergeants and more experienced soldiers.

RoomTemplate.Title: In The &+LOrcish&n Encampment
RoomTemplate.Description: Dozens of tents have been pitched in this area in spite of the rough terrain. Although the tents are not as densely packed here, there are still quite a few campfires still burning.

RoomTemplate.Title: In The &+LOrcish&n Encampment
RoomTemplate.Description: Dozens of tents have been pitched in this clearing, housing the bulk of the orcish foot soldiers in the attacking force. A few campfires burn smokily in the area.

RoomTemplate.Title: Edge of a Battlefield
RoomTemplate.Description: This is obviously a battlefield. The ground is trampled by the prints of many boots and hooves. Broken weaponry, shattered armor, and fresh bodies litter the ground. The Orcish battle encampment stretches off to the south and west.

RoomTemplate.Title: West of a Breach in the Wall
RoomTemplate.Description: You stand before the sheer wall of the minotaur stronghold. It would be very easy for a defender to drop something heavy and painful from this distance. Off to the east you see a breach in the wall where the Orcish siege engines have pierced the stronghold's defenses. The battlefield stretches off to the south.

RoomTemplate.Title: Before the Stronghold Wall
RoomTemplate.Description: You stand before the sheer wall of the stronghold. A half-concealed tunnel burrows into the ground here. It appears that the attackers are trying to circumvent the defenses rather than attempt a direct assault.

RoomTemplate.Title: Northwest Corner of the &+LOrcish&n Encampment
RoomTemplate.Description: Surprisingly close to the stronghold, this area houses the tents of the Orcish medical personnel. Many injured soldiers are milling or lying about in the area.

RoomTemplate.Title: In The &+LOrcish&n Encampment
RoomTemplate.Description: This area is relatively flat and clear and a large number of tents have been set up here. Many soldiers are moving about preparing for or returning from battle.

RoomTemplate.Title: In The &+LOrcish&n Encampment
RoomTemplate.Description: This area is relatively flat and clear and a large number of tents have been set up here. Many soldiers are milling and straggering about depending on their level of health and wakefulness.

RoomTemplate.Title: Southwest Corner of the &+LOrc Encampment
RoomTemplate.Description: The edge of the encampment is marked by rough terrain. A few scattered tents have been pitched here, but the occupancy is severely limited by the rocks and rough brush. Soldiers who sleep here are going to wake up sore.

RoomTemplate.Title: West Edge of the &+LOrc&n Encampment
RoomTemplate.Description: To the west the terrain gets rougher and rougher, becoming nearly impassable. There are a small number of larger tents set up here, serving as barracks for the Orcish infantry.

RoomTemplate.Title: West Edge of the &+LOrc&n Encampment
RoomTemplate.Description: To the west the terrain gets rougher and rougher, becoming nearly impassable. There are a small number of mid-sized tents set up here, serving as barracks for the Orcish spearmen.

RoomTemplate.Title: West Edge of the &+LOrc&n Encampment
RoomTemplate.Description: To the west the terrain gets rougher and rougher, becoming nearly impassable. There are a small number of tents set up here, serving serving as barracks for the Orcish artillery.

RoomTemplate.Title: A Breach in the Wall
RoomTemplate.Description: This narrow passageway has been smashed through the stronghold's defenses by the Orcish siege engines. It could collapse at any moment.

RoomTemplate.Title: Inside the &+rMinotaur&n Stronghold by a Breach in the Wall
RoomTemplate.Description: The ground is strewn with rubble from the stronghold's walls. The rest of the fortress is fairly untouched by siege.

RoomTemplate.Title: Inside the &+rMinotaur&n Stronghold
RoomTemplate.Description: You are within the Minotaur stronghold, surrounded on all sides by stone walls. The area is very clean and spartan in spite of the fact that there is a siege going on.

RoomTemplate.Title: Inside the &+rMinotaur&n Stronghold
RoomTemplate.Description: You are surrounded by the smooth stone walls of the stronghold. Sputtering torches line the walls, giving off just enough light to see clearly. To the east is the captain's quarters.

RoomTemplate.Title: In the &+rMinotaur&n Captain's Quarters
RoomTemplate.Description: This is the captain's quarters. Intricate tapestries line the walls and a great oak strategy table sits in the center of the room. Lists of provisions and battle plans are organized neatly on the table. Beside the table are many large carved wooden chairs.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yProvision&n Storage Room
RoomTemplate.Description: This is the main storeroom for the Minotaur stronghold. Provisions are stacked neatly along the walls. Dozens of boxes and bags are clearly marked as containing rations, clothing, and equipment.

RoomTemplate.Title: A Dining Area
RoomTemplate.Description: This room is filled with large dining tables and long benches. The smell of a recent meal hangs in the air, but the room is spotless. A few carpets cover the floor, more utilitarian than decorative.

RoomTemplate.Title: Inside the &+rMinotaur&n Stronghold
RoomTemplate.Description: This is a well-traveled hall within the Minotaur stronghold. Sputtering torches line the walls, giving off just enough light to see clearly.

RoomTemplate.Title: Inside the &+rMinotaur&n Stronghold
RoomTemplate.Description: You are in a chamber of the Minotaur stronghold. Chairs line the walls and plain carpets cover the floor, more utilitarian than decorative.

RoomTemplate.Title: Inside the &+rMinotaur&n Stronghold
RoomTemplate.Description: You are surrounded on all sides by the smooth stone walls of the stronghold. Sputtering torches light the halls, giving off just enough light to see clearly by.

RoomTemplate.Title: Before a Barracks
RoomTemplate.Description: Soldiers are pouring out of the barracks to the south and running by, on their way to engage the invading Orcish forces.

RoomTemplate.Title: Inside the Barracks
RoomTemplate.Description: The bulk of the Minotaur forces reside here in this fairly cramped barracks. Worn, sagging beds line the walls. Soldiers are moving about, preparing for the next battle.

RoomTemplate.Title: Inside the Barracks
RoomTemplate.Description: The bulk of the Minotaur forces reside here in this fairly cramped barracks. Worn, sagging beds line the walls. Soldiers are moving about, preparing for the next battle.

RoomTemplate.Title: Inside a Concealed Tunnel
RoomTemplate.Description: This tunnel has been dug by workers in a hurry. It has not been reinforced and could collapse at any moment.

RoomTemplate.Title: Inside a Partially-Completed Tunnel
RoomTemplate.Description: This tunnel is an active excavation site. It appears that the Orcish forces have no more than a few feet to go before they break through on the other side of the defensive wall.

ObjTemplate.Name: lichen basalt totem fuzzy green
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+gA fuzzy green rock rests here.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: carved sliver bone piece
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+WA piece of bone covered in crude carvings sits here.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: bracer spiked spikes clumsy leather
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+yA bracer covered in clumsy-looking spikes rests here.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: gnarled cudgel
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+yA discarded cudgel lies here.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: awkward sword khopesh clumsy
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: An awkward-looking sword rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: sleek well made gladius
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A well-made gladius lies here.

ObjTemplate.Name: copper ring
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+yA copper ring sits here.&n

ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+rA ring covered in garnets lies here.&N

ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+gA ring of carved jade sits here.&n

ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A worn pair of greaves sits here.

ObjTemplate.Name: orcish sword short shortsword
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: An unnamed object lies here, looking lonely and forelorn.

ObjTemplate.FullDescription: An unnamed object lies here, looking lonely and forelorn.

ObjTemplate.Name: heavy battle axe battleaxe
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+LA heavy battle axe lies here in the dirt.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: blue steel battle axe battleaxe
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+LA heavy &+Bblue &+Lbattle axe lies here in the dirt.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: old hand axe
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+LAn old axe lies here in the dirt.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: scalp orc top
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: The top of an &+Lorc&n's head lies here.

ObjTemplate.Name: collar spiked spikes
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+yA collar covered in spikes sits here.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: leather helmet sallet
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+yA leather helmet sits here in the dirt.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: leather armor cuirass suit
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+yA suit of leather armor has been tossed here.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: leather sleeves pair
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+yA pair of leather sleeves has been left behind.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: leather gauntlets pair
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+yA pair of leather gauntlets has been left here.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: belt orc skulls
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+yA belt fashioned from &+Lorc&n&+y skulls lies here.&N

ObjTemplate.Name: earring carved basalt rock
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A carved piece of rock has been dropped here.

ObjTemplate.Name: rough hand axe
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+LA heavy battle axe lies here in the dirt.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: pike long
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A long &+cpike&n rests here on the ground.

ObjTemplate.Name: mask orc flesh
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: An unnamed object lies here, looking lonely and forelorn.

ObjTemplate.Name: bear obsidian carved totem
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+gA fuzzy green rock rests here.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: cloak leather dirty
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+yA leather cloak sits here in the dirt.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: copper spectacles glasses
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A pair of glasses rests here, gathering dust.

ObjTemplate.Name: minotaur scalp top
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: The top of a &+rminotaur&n's head lies here.

ObjTemplate.Name: orcish mining pick
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A mining pick of Orcish make lies here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: Although he has not seen very many battles, this Minotaur soldier is ready to give his life for the cause.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rminotaur&n stands here, ready to defend the stronghold.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This unusually tall Orc is ready to take on the world, or at least a few dozen minotaur. If only he had better training and equipment.
MobTemplate.Description: A tall &+Lorcish&n raider stands here, ready to fight.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Orc looks pretty tough. Hey may just be one of the lucky few to survive this battle.
MobTemplate.Description: A burly &+Lorcish&n raider stands here, ready for combat.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This skinny Orc is a little too young and undernourished to be able to contribute much to this fight, but he is ready to give it his best.
MobTemplate.Description: A skinny &+Lorcish&n raider stands here, hoping for a fight.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This battle-ready Orc is prepared to meet the enemy head-on, even if it means this will be his last battle.
MobTemplate.Description: An &+Lorcish&n sergeant stands here, ready to charge into battle.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Orcish captain would rather be back home planning strategy than in the thick of a siege. He appears to be rather skilled and ready for action.
MobTemplate.Description: An &+Lorcish&n captain stands here, ready to command the fight.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Orcish artillery engineer is calculating the trajectory needed for a projectile to be able to breach the walls. He is hastily noting figures on a scrap of hide and is barely aware of his surroundings.
MobTemplate.Description: An &+Lorcish&n engineer is here, calculating siege trajectories.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This raider has quite a few wounds from his latest tangle with the enemy. He needs a bit of patching up before he can rejoin the fight.
MobTemplate.Description: An injured &+Lorcish&n raider slumps here after losing a fight.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Orc is carrying many pouches of herbs and medicines and is ready to tend to the injuries of his comrades.
MobTemplate.Description: An &+Lorcish&n medic stands here, ready to patch up his comrades.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Orc is covered in dirt and dust and looks a little weary, but he clearly still has the energy to fight if necessary.
MobTemplate.Description: An &+Lorcish&n digger stands here, working on the tunnel.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Minotaur has been awake for days. He desperately needs some sleep but is not willing to take the chance of having the stronghold fall while he rests.
MobTemplate.Description: A haggard &+rminotaur&n is here, ready to defend the stronghold.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: A bit burlier than the other guards, this Minotaur stands resolute in his determination to defend his strategic position.
MobTemplate.Description: A strong &+rminotaur&n stands here, protecting the stronghold.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: Resolved to his fate, this Minotaur intends to go down fighting and goring to the last breath.
MobTemplate.Description: A resolute &+rminotaur&n stands here, waiting for an attack.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Minotaur has seen more battles than most, as evidenced by the many scars on his tough hide.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rminotaur&n sergeant is here, preparing for invasion.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Minotaur has an air of command. With many battle scars, he has seen his share of fights and lived.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rminotaur&n captain stands here, guarding the stronghold.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This hungry dog has a hunted look in its eyes and is ready to attack anything that moves.
MobTemplate.Description: &+yA war dog sits here, waiting to attack.&n

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This dog has scars and is missing an ear, but has probably won more fights than it has lost.
MobTemplate.Description: &+yA war dog sits here, waiting to attack.&n

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Minotaur has totems and sigils branded directly into its chest. He has a thoughtful look about him and seems to be mumbling to himself.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rminotaur&n shaman stands here, ready for battle.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Orcish darknight is ready to bring the pain to his heathen enemies. They shall see the One True Darkness and revel in its glory.
MobTemplate.Description: An &+Lorcish&n knight stands here, ready for action.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This overworked minotaur seems to be in charge of making sure the others have enough food and weaponry to keep them in the fight.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rminotaur&n works here, managing the provisions.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This raider is one of the rank-and-file soldiers of the Orcish army. His equipment is barely adequate, but he has the will and the energy to join the fight.
MobTemplate.Description: An &+Lorcish&n raider stands here, prepared for battle.

QuestData.Complete: A "Excellent work! With your help we might just be able to hold them off. Here is your reward."

TalkData.Keywords: A orc orcish orcs battle raid raider raiders
TalkData.Message: "Those damned Orc raiders keep bringing larger and larger forces to try to take the stronghold. This time I think they just might succeed." "If you can bring me the scalps of three of their leaders I will give you what reward I can."

QuestData.Complete: "Your contribution to the cause will not be forgotten. Here is your reward."

TalkData.Keywords: A minotaur mino siege raid raider raiders scalp
TalkData.Message: "Oh, so you're not just here to get in the way? OK, then, go get me the scalps of three Minotaur officers. That'll help our cause. You'll be rewarded, of course."
